A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly\, I went into this movie with low expectations\, and walked out blown away. All the people who gave this film a 0 or .5 score need to stop hyping these big budget movies up in their heads\, and watch them for what they are. ENTERTAINING FILMS. I mean they don’t have the cinematography of a Nolan movie\, or the humor of a Tarantino movie. They are just made to please the general audience. With that being said\, watch them for what they are\, and stop listening to what the fans are saying.
